email_template.name: data_request_under_review
email_template.subject: [Ticket ID: {{ticket_id}}] Data Request from data.gov.my
email_template.content: Dear {{name}}, your request for data on {{dataset_title}} from {{agency}} has been reviewed by our moderators and is now live on our Data Request page (https://data.gov.my/data-request) as a ticket Under Review. To access it quickly, you may search for id:{{ticket_id}} on our Data Request page (https://data.gov.my/data-request?ticket_id={{ticket_id}}).
email_template.html_content:
Dear {{name}},

Your request for data on {{dataset_title}} from {{agency}} has been reviewed by our moderators and is now live on our Data Request page as a ticket Under Review.

To access it quickly, you may search for id:{{ticket_id}} on our Data Request page.

Warm regards,
data.gov.my data team

email_template.name: data_request_under_review
email_template.subject: [Tiket ID: {{ticket_id}}] Permintaan Data dari data.gov.my
email_template.content: Salam sejahtera {{name}}, permohonan data mengenai {{dataset_title}} daripada {{agency}} telah diterima dan sedang disemak. Jika diluluskan, maklumat akan diterbitkan di halaman Permintaan Data kami dengan ID tiket {{ticket_id}}. Anda boleh menyemaknya di: https://data.gov.my/ms-MY/data-request?ticket_id={{ticket_id}}.
email_template.html_content:
Salam sejahtera {{name}},

Permohonan anda untuk data mengenai {{dataset_title}} daripada {{agency}} telah disemak oleh para moderator dan diterbitkan di halaman Permintaan Data kami sebagai tiket Dalam Tindakan.

Untuk semakan pantas, anda boleh mencari id:{{ticket_id}} di halaman Permintaan Data kami.

Sekian, terima kasih.
Pasukan data data.gov.my
